official_title: Efficacy of Real-Time Computer Aided-Detected of Colonic Neoplasia in an Underserved Population, A Randomized Controlled Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* Undergoing colonoscopy at RUHS
* Age > 45 years
* No contraindications to colonoscopy
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 30 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
